pullrequest.title: add support for 'stopCmd' and 'logsCmd' in simulations, and other changes

content.raw:
Yeah I was just looking at the log... This is the last stuff I see:

~~~
listening on *:4000
One field computer per team.
Fri Apr 21 17:11:58 2017 TUN/TAP device tap-simulator opened
Fri Apr 21 17:11:58 2017 Persist state set to: ON
brctl addif br-simulator eth-simulator
brctl addif br-simulator tap-simulator
Fri Apr 21 17:11:58 UTC 2017
deploy complete
Fri Apr 21 17:11:58 UTC 2017
executed: /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim_deploy.bash
Fri Apr 21 17:11:58 UTC 2017
cloud-init is done
~~~
